name: Critter Bar
description:
Serve strange creatures at the Critter Bar!

Controls: Mouse only

Notes: 

Made in roughly less than 48 hours (I had to sleep)

Gameplay: Wait for a critter to ask for a drink, grab a glass and bring it to the proper tap area, pull the tap to fill glass, bring glass to the critter. Once a glass is used, clean it with the sink :)

Concept/Art from Drawfee (@DrawfeeShow) here:
